world.bentobox.bentobox.managers

Class PlayersManager

  • java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayersManager(BentoBox plugin)
      Provides a memory cache of online player information This is the one-stop-shop of player info If the player is not cached, then a request is made to Players to obtain it

      • PlayersManager

        public PlayersManager(BentoBox plugin)
        Provides a memory cache of online player information This is the one-stop-shop of player info If the player is not cached, then a request is made to Players to obtain it

    • Method Detail

      • setHandler

        public void setHandler(Database<Players> handler)
        Used only for testing. Sets the database to a mock database.
        Parameters:
        handler - - handler

      • load

        public void load()
        Load all players - not normally used as to load all players into memory will be wasteful

      • saveAll

        public void saveAll()
        Save all players

      • asyncSaveAll

        public void asyncSaveAll()
        Saves all the players at a rate of 1 per tick. Used as a backup.
        Since:
        1.8.0

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()

      • getPlayer

        public Players getPlayer(UUID uuid)
        Get player by UUID. Adds player to cache if not in there already
        Parameters:
        uuid - of player
        Returns:
        player object or null if it does not exist

      • getPlayers

        public @NonNull Collection<Players> getPlayers()
        Returns an unmodifiable collection of all the players that are currently in the cache.
        Returns:
        unmodifiable collection containing every player in the cache.
        Since:
        1.1

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(UUID playerUUID)
        Adds a player to the cache. If the UUID does not exist, a new player is made
        Parameters:
        playerUUID - - the player's UUID

      • isKnown

        public boolean isKnown(UUID uniqueID)
        Checks if the player is known or not. Will check not just the cache but if the object is in the database too.
        Parameters:
        uniqueID - - unique ID
        Returns:
        true if player is known, otherwise false

      • getResetsLeft

        public int getResetsLeft(org.bukkit.World world,
                         UUID playerUUID)
        Returns how many island resets the player can still do.
        Parameters:
        world - world
        playerUUID - the player's UUID
        Returns:
        number of resets the player can do (always >= 0), or -1 if unlimited.
        Since:
        1.5.0
        See Also:
        getResets(World, UUID)
